EIVHUD_inspire_cooldown_text: Inspire still has a cooldown of
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudOptions: Enhanced and Improved Vanilla Hud options.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudShowObj:
Choose how the objectives will be displayed 
 Improved tab stats must be enabled for the objectives to display there.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudShowTim:
Choose how the heist timer will be displayed 
 Improved tab stats must be enabled for the timer to display there
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudShowHos:
Choose how the hostage counter will be displayed 
 Improved tab stats must be enabled for the hostages to display there.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudShowWav:
Choose how the wave counter will be displayed 
 Improved tab stats must be enabled for the waves to display there.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudTabDesc: Adds additional information to the tabstats such as kills/accuracy/trade delay.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudChatDes: Makes the in-game chat less obtrusive.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudHideMas: Hides the text on the hud telling you which button to use to put the mask on.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudBullets: Displays an infinite ammo symbol when bulletstorm is active.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudScreenE: Displays the duration of kingpin and swansong on the screen by flashing.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudArmorer: Displays the armor buff Cooldown for Armorer/Anarchist/Copycat.
Choosa a color for the cooldown timer.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudGraceCo: Choosa a color for the cooldown timer.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudTrueamm: The ammo display will be animaited when reloading or picking up ammo.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudGreenci: Marks controlled civilians green on the hud.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudInfobox: Display the duration of active ECM timers.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudPagerJa: Only Display ECM Timers With Pager Delay
If an ECM jammer doesn't block pagers from going off the timer won't be visible.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudHideBox: Hides the background and white box edges from the timer display.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudInspire: Adds a hint text displaying remaining cooldown time for inspire.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudToggleI: Pick how long an interaction have to be for the toggle to activate.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudInterup: Displays a text when the interaction is locked and how to cancel the interaction.
Changes the cancel key for interacting from the interaction key to the deploy equipment key (default G).
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudBagInfo: Displays the bag content in the interaction text
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudTeamLoa: Display throwables and Second deployables in the preplanning.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudMenuFil: This will disable the default blue menu color filter. The menu color grading can be changed in the games video options under advanced settings.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudLevelDi: Displays the rank of players joining mid-game.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudSkipDia: Remove some of the >Are you sure< messages when navigating menus.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudPickCar: Automatically pick a lootcard at the loot screen.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudSkipXPD: Choose how long it will take for the automatic screen skip to activate.
Enhanced and Improved Vanilla HudSkipCar: Choose how long it will take for the automatic screen skip to activate.
